text.__SUMMARY__: Aloe castanea (Cat's Tail Aloe) is a species of aloe endemic to South Africa. It grows to about 12' in height, with a single stem that may become branched in the upper portion, with clusters of small, dark, orange-brown flowers.
text.References:
Rec. Albany Mus. 2: 138 1907.
